name: com.htc.upm.wave.xrsdk
description:
The "VIVE Wave XR Plugin" package surves as a bridge between VIVE moblile devices and Unity.
By communicuating with Unity's "XR Plugin Management" package, this package allows your application to run on VIVE mobile devices.

View the documentation for additional information.

samples.description: Common sample. Created by pure Unity. Common used by other samples.  Please import com.unity.xr.management 3.0.6 or higher and com.unity.xr.legacyinputhelpers 2.1.4 or higher first
Basic sample showing how to use Wave XR.
